name: payment-api-example
description: Axios POST example for payment API based on schemas/pay.json

scripts.schema:validate: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const index = require('./schemas/index.json'); index.apis.forEach(api => { try { JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('./schemas/' + api.file, 'utf8')); console.log('✅ ' + api.name + ' - Valid'); } catch (e) { console.log('❌ ' + api.name + ' - Invalid: ' + e.message); } });"
scripts.schema:stats: node -e "const index = require('./schemas/index.json'); console.log('Total APIs:', index.total_apis); console.log('Payment APIs:', index.categories.payment.count); console.log('Auth APIs:', index.categories.auth.count); console.log('Webhooks:', index.webhooks.count); console.log('Client APIs:', index.client_apis.count);"
